text: Egh arazir kamɨn a Bar Anogoroghezir Danganim damightɨ, a nan damazimɨn zuegham. Guizbangɨra, Israelian gumazamiziba arazir mɨzɨrɨzibagh amua nan akaba batuegha, arazir kurar avɨribagh ami, ezɨ arazir kam Bar Anogoroghezir Danganim gamima, a mɨze. Na bativamin Purirpenim men tongɨn iti, ezɨ men arazir kurar kaba da Purirpenimɨn bizibagh amima, da bar nan damazimɨn mɨze. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Aron ghuzitaba inigh, na bativamin Purirpenimɨn danganir igharazibar kamaghɨra dar amigh. Mati a faragha Bar Anogoroghezir Danganim gamizɨ mokɨn. Arazir kamra, a Purirpenim damutɨ a ua zuegham.
